generation.dangerFilter:
Content Review: Your prompt may contain potentially dangerous or harmful content

Suggestions:
- Avoid descriptions of violence, weapons, or dangerous activities
- Do not include content that could cause harm
- Use safe, neutral descriptions
- Focus on positive, creative content

Example:
Bad: Descriptions involving violence or dangerous scenarios
Good: Peaceful, creative scenes with positive themes
generation.prominentPeopleFilter:
‚ö†Ô∏è Content Policy: Your prompt may contain references to real celebrities or public figures

üîß Suggestions:
‚Ä¢ Avoid using names of real celebrities or political figures
‚Ä¢ Do not describe specific features of famous people
‚Ä¢ Use generic descriptions (e.g., "blonde singer" instead of specific names)
‚Ä¢ Describe styles and characteristics rather than specific individuals

üí° Examples:
‚ùå "A famous actor on the red carpet"
‚úÖ "An elegant person walking confidently on the red carpet"

changelog.title: What's New
changelog.description: Track the latest updates and improvements to ShotRio

0121.item1: Agent responses adapt to your interface language
0121.item2: Agent cinematography improved for professional shot descriptions
0121.item3: Video regeneration with custom parameters and auto-filled frames
0121.item5: Asset thumbnails now show names for quick identification
0121.item6: New resolution selector with more output sizes
0121.item7: Editor UI polished for smoother interactions

0108.item1: Audio generation launched (sound effects + background music)

0105.item1: Auto-apply project style to generated content

0104.item2: Auto-detect asset types with Markdown support

0101.item1: Video editing timeline with zoom and trim

1228.item2: Shot size and camera movement mapping

section1.title: Information Collection
section1.content: We collect information you provide when using our services, including but not limited to account information and creative content.

section2.title: Types of Information We Collect
section2.item1: Account Information: Including your email address, username, and other registration information
section2.item2: Creative Content: Projects, assets, videos, and other content you create on the platform
section2.item3: Usage Data: How you use our services, including access times and features used
section2.item4: Device Information: Your device type, operating system, browser type, and other technical information

section3.title: How We Use Information
section3.content: We use the collected information to:
section3.item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
section3.item4: Protect user security and prevent fraud

section4.title: Information Sharing
section4.content: We do not sell your personal information. We only share information with trusted third-party service providers when necessary to provide services.

section5.title: Data Security
section5.content: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encrypted transmission and secure storage.

section6.title: Your Rights
section6.content: You have the right to access, correct, delete your personal information, or withdraw consent for data processing.

section7.title: Cookie Usage
section7.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience and analyze service usage.

section8.title: Contact Us
section8.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at contact@shotrio.com.

section1.title: Service Terms
section1.content: Welcome to ShotRio. By accessing or using our services, you agree to comply with the terms of this agreement.

section2.title: Account Responsibility
section2.content: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and are liable for all activities under your account.

section3.title: Service Usage
section3.item1: You must be at least 18 years old or use the service under the supervision of a legal guardian
section3.item2: You must not use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purposes
section3.item3: You must not interfere with or disrupt the normal operation of the service
section3.item4: You must not attempt unauthorized access to any part of the service

section4.title: Content Rights
section4.item1: You retain all ownership rights to your creative content
section4.item2: You grant us necessary permissions to use, store, and process your content to provide services
section4.item3: You ensure you have legal rights to upload content
section4.item4: We reserve the right to remove content that violates the terms

section5.title: Credits and Payment
section5.content: All credit purchases are final transactions and non-refundable. We reserve the right to modify prices and services at any time.

section6.title: Service Changes
section6.content: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate services at any time without prior notice.

section7.title: Disclaimer
section7.content: Services are provided 'as is.' We make no warranties regarding the suitability, reliability, or availability of services.

section8.title: Limitation of Liability
section8.content: To the extent permitted by law, we are not liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use the services.

section9.title: Dispute Resolution
section9.content: This agreement is governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China. Any disputes should be resolved through friendly negotiation.

imageGeneration.title: AI Image Generation
imageGeneration.description: Create stunning characters, scenes, and props with state-of-the-art AI

videoGeneration.title: AI Video Generation
videoGeneration.description: Powered by Google Veo 3.1 ‚Äî Industry-leading video model

audioGeneration.title: AI Audio Generation
audioGeneration.description: Professional sound effects and music by ElevenLabs & Suno

q1.question: What can I use credits for?
q1.answer: Credits power all AI generation features: images (6 credits each), videos (6 credits per second), sound effects (1 credit), and music tracks (10 credits).

q2.question: Do credits expire?
q2.answer: Never. Your credits are yours forever ‚Äî use them whenever inspiration strikes.

q3.question: How do bonus credits work?
q3.answer: Larger packages include bonus credits automatically. Standard adds 5%, Pro adds 7%, and Ultimate adds 10% extra credits to your purchase.

q4.question: What payment methods are accepted?
q4.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallets through our secure payment processor.

q5.question: What's your refund policy?
q5.answer: Credits are non-refundable once purchased. However, if generation fails due to technical issues, credits are automatically restored to your account.
